aNormal: function
  • Defined in visual/GridOptions.ts:28
default

(u: number, v: number) => e3

Type declaration

Optional aPosition

aPosition: function
  • Defined in visual/GridOptions.ts:22

A parametric function determining the positions of points in the grid.

umin <= u <= umax

vmin <= v <= vmax

default

(u: number, v: number) => u e1 + v e2

Type declaration

    • (u: number, v: number): VectorE3

    • Parameters

      • u: number
      • v: number

      Returns VectorE3

contextManager: ContextManager

Inherited from VisualOptions.contextManager

The manager of the WebGL context.

Optional engine

engine: ContextManager

Inherited from VisualOptions.engine

  • Defined in visual/VisualOptions.ts:22

The manager of the WebGL context (alias for contextManager).

Optional k

k: number
  • Defined in visual/GridOptions.ts:40

0: points 1: lines 2: surface

Optional offset

offset: VectorE3

Inherited from VisualOptions.offset

  • Defined in visual/VisualOptions.ts:28

Displacement (vector) to be applied to the geometry at construction time to establish the reference location. This cannot be changed once the object has been created because it is burned-in to the vertex locations.

Optional stress

stress: VectorE3

Inherited from VisualOptions.stress

  • Defined in visual/VisualOptions.ts:40

Scaling (tensor) to be applied to the geometry at construction time to establish the reference size. This cannot be changed once the object has been created because it is burned-in to the vertex locations.

Optional tilt

tilt: SpinorE3

Inherited from VisualOptions.tilt

  • Defined in visual/VisualOptions.ts:34

Rotation (spinor) to be applied to the geometry at construction time to establish the reference orientation. This cannot be changed once the object has been created because it is burned-in to the vertex locations.

Optional uMax

uMax: number
  • Defined in visual/GridOptions.ts:50

The maximum value of the u coordinate.

Optional uMin

uMin: number
  • Defined in visual/GridOptions.ts:45

The minimum value of the u coordinate.

Optional uSegments

uSegments: number
  • Defined in visual/GridOptions.ts:55

The number of segments for the u coordinate.

Optional vMax

vMax: number
  • Defined in visual/GridOptions.ts:65

The maximum value of the v coordinate.

Optional vMin

vMin: number
  • Defined in visual/GridOptions.ts:60

The minimum value of the v coordinate.

Optional vSegments

vSegments: number
  • Defined in visual/GridOptions.ts:70

The number of segments for the v coordinate.
